title: Research scenario set stress study - op def of DV

content.description:
Dr. Salim recruited a group of high school students who had reported experiencing high stress over the last 6 months. The students took a self-reported 10-point stress inventory before the study.
They were then randomly divided between a group that had no changes to their current daily schedule and another group that participated in a daily 20-minute mindfulness exercise.Â 
After eight weeks, all students were asked to self-report stress levels again by completing the same 10-point scale. Those in the mindfulness exercise group had a statistically significant decrease in their stress levels, while those who continued their daily routine had no change in self-reported stress.
content.question: Which of the following statements best describes the operational definition of the dependent variable?

choices.label: The mindfulness exercise in which participants were engaged
The group that continued with the same routine they had before the study
The reported level of stress on a 10-point scale after the mindfulness intervention or after no intervention
Whether students were exposed or not exposed to mindfulness training

content.answer: The reported level of stress on a 10-point scale after the mindfulness intervention or after no intervention

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
